data:
it’s like microblogging, but bigger
deciblogging, perhaps

Don’t buy this camera. All shots on this page were on Gold 200. Somewhere with rocks, CO
Duluth, MN
San Juan, PR

The Ricoh RZ-3000 was also released under the names Shotmaster 130Z, Q-130Z, and MyPort 330. It’s a rather unremarkable camera but the 38-130mm lens does allow more zoom than most of its point and shoot peers. All pictures on this page are shot on Portra 400.
These page is currently being used to experiment with image formatting.
Portra 400 Is it really whitespace if it’s gray? Focused on the mountain, exposed for the trees. Masterful gambit, sir. tree
